page.title: 13RELIGION and CUSTOMS
page.content:
{Lynturk Church. Lynturk Church is 121 years old. Cushnie and Lynturk is a joint parish served by one Church of Scotland minister. The congregational roll is 275. Services are held each Sunday on alternate months at Lynturk and Cushnie. 12 children are on the Sunday school roll.
{Halloween. At halloween we hollow out turnips and cut out a face so that the candle light shines through. Then we all dress up and go round to folks houses where we perform a piece in the hopes of being given a reward. This is known as Guisering. Some times we have parties and duck for apples which are floating in a bowl of water.
